data.name: Great Adventures in New Worlds Vol. 2
data.detailed_description:
This bundle will add two new areas to the game: a BLUE REFLECTION tribute area "Blue Sentiment Land" and the "Ventus Mines" area.

- Painting World "Blue Sentiment Land"
This world is full of unique enemies and items, and if you find the monstrous enemy Sephira Netzach and defeat it, you may even receive the rings of those famous magic girls who visited this world before.

- Outskirts Area "Ventus Mines"
The surroundings are overgrown with greenery, but you can still see the wooden constructions of the old Ventus Mines. This area is also full of interesting materials with rare effects and traits.

*This content unlocks after the final chapter of the game.
*This content is also included into "Atelier Lydie & Suelle Season Pass."

fullgame.name: Atelier Lydie & Suelle ~The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings~

data.supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX550Ti or better, 1280x720
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OnBoard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i7 3.40GHz over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
